FuncDef:
The multicast-profile command binds a multicast profile to the AAA domain.
The undo multicast-profile command unbinds the multicast profile from the AAA domain.
By default, no multicast profile is bound to a domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the multicast profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Bind a multicast profile to the AAA domain.
Precautions
The multicast profile specified in this command must exist.
